Merge pull request #356 from slavick/abstract_map_interface

Replaced HashMap method arguments and return values with Map.
Replaced HashMap method arguments and return values with Map. This allows alternative implementations of the Map interface (such as android.support.v4.util.ArrayMap) to be used.

Fix timezone change issue when showing month name (issue #308)

Fix timezone change issue when showing month name

The month title show the month name of last month when users timezone change after firstMonthTime is set, I am able to reproduce with the following steps:

1/ Set to Amsterdam timezone
2/ Open the calendar
3/ Switch to Minsk timezone
3/ Open the calendar
